EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for joining us!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/the-cloud-native-journey?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-native-journey-webinar-replay> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for attending Pivotal's Cloud Native Journey Webinar this week. Here's a quick recap:
- We looked at the common patterns that distinguish cloud native companies and the architectures that they employ. - We discovered that an opinionated platform, one that stretches from the infrastructure all the way to the application framework, rather than ad-hoc automation, is an essential component to an enterprise's cloud native journey. - We showed that the combination of Pivotal Cloud Foundry and Spring is the complete cloud native platform.
Want to watch it again? We invite you to view the replay <http://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/the-cloud-native-journey?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-native-journey-webinar-replay> and check out the slides <http://www.slideshare.net/slideshow/embed_code/key/3YhjVI8PiaogXU?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-native-journey-webinar-slides>.
Did you know that Matt Stine recently published an O'Reilly Microservices eBook? This report defines the unique characteristics of cloud native application architectures such as microservices and twelve-factor applications. Download it now <http://pivotal.io/platform/migrating-to-cloud-native-application-architectures-ebook?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-native-journey-webinar-matt-stine-ebook>!
Want more? Learn how <https://d1fto35gcfffzn.cloudfront.net/cloud-native/infographic/Pivotal-The-Journey-to-Cloud-Native.pdf?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-native-journey-webinar-infographic> Pivotal is transforming how the world builds software and embark on your Cloud Native Journey.
Thanks again for joining us!
The Pivotal Team
